title: Open Culture Research Simulation Course for Job Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment referencing remote northern Australian university cases, combining VR simulations with cultural studies and job competency development in smartphone-centric limited technological settings

learning_goals: Learners critically analyze problems arising in cross-cultural collaboration scenarios via VR simulations and propose solutions.
Learners design creative solutions applicable to workplace environments using Open Educational Resources (OER) and incorporate peer feedback.
Learners interpret cultural data collected through a digital platform (smartphone app) and systematically present findings in a job report format.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
